scripts.setup-client-app: npm i && cd client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.setup-node-app: cd server && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.client: cd client && npm run dev && npm build
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail " npm run server" " npm run client"
scripts.production: npm run setup-node-app && npm run setup-client-app
